Just seems odd that there isn't any actual code on the community page, so that'd fix it
is that pulling from..pypi?
the idea is it would be a stream of commits or updates to projects.
as for the facility in which that happens.. my original intent was pyppi, but there would have to be some form of filtering on dp.com's side, which I didn't want to add.
2nd intent was for people to put github commit rss feeds there. If its spammy, so what. Would serve as a decent package discovery mechanism I think.
